circumstances: The airplane departed Aktyubinsk Airport on a mail flight, carrying one pilot and 125 kg of mail. Ten minutes after takeoff, the pilot decided to return because he thought there was a loss of hydraulic pressure. Following a wrong approach configuration, he landed with a tailwind component when, upon landing, the airplane crashed and collided with a parked Polikarpov SP registered CCCP-L1018. The pilot escaped with minor injuries and the airplane was destroyed.
probable_cause:
The following contributing factors were identified:
- The pilot adopted wrong piloting techniques, 
- Wrong approach calculation and configuration, 
- Non compliance with published procedures, 
- The pilot landed with a tailwind component,
- The person in charge of the airport failed to change the 'T' according to the wind component.
